thread.title: Lamar Odom Discharged From Hospital with Khloe Kardashian By His Side
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom Discharged From Hospital with Khloe Kardashian By His Side - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Lamar Odom Discharged From Hospital with Khloe Kardashian By His Side
text: Lamar Odom has officially been released from his Las Vegas area hospital and transferred to a Los Angeles hospital on Monday (October 19) in a helicopter. The 35-year-old former NBA star can swallow food and talk on his own, and will be going through months of rehab. Khloe Kardashian was seen leaving the hospital with [...] Â»
